Typhon, or, The gyants war with the gods a mock-poem, in five canto's. Typhon. English Scarron, Monsieur, 1610-1660. Phillips, John, 1631-1706.
[4], 160 p.
Printed for Samuel Speed ..., London : 1665.
Translation of Typhon by John Phillips. Written by Scarron. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in British Library.
